::Battera::

She walked out of her room and walked down the hallway.  She turned 
and headed towards the outside hatch.  She wanted to see the sky 
again.  

She felt like flying around and enjoying the day.  But she knew that 
she was bound by her word and wouldn't leave the ship.  She sighed 
and went out the hatch.  she stood on the ramp and looked out over 
the landscape.  She closed her eyes, wrapped ehr wings around her 
slender figure, and envisioned what it was like to fly over the land 
and feel the wind under her wings.
